casebody.data:
BLANKENSHIP
v.
BARTLETT. No. 455PA06-2. Supreme Court of North Carolina. October 9, 2008. Jamie L. Vavonese, Amie C. Sivon, Fuquay-Varina, for Blankenship, et al. *25Alexander McC. Peters, Susan K. Nichols, Karen E. Long, Special Deputy Attorney Generals, for State of NC.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 23rd day of August 2007 by Plaintiffs for Enlargement of Time to Serve Notice of Appeal and Petition:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 9th day of October 2008."
